Description.Text: The luxurious 5-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort is situated along the azure coast of Elounda, just 3km away from the village centre. The hotel is furnished to a very high standard in stone, marble, wood and minimalist design culminating in a striking modern style. It is a seaside paradise in an extraordinary setting, which offers an enormous variety of services and facilities, perfect for both an action-packed family holiday and a relaxing getaway. These include indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a state-of-the-art gym, a 9-hole golf course, supervised childrenâs playgrounds and creative entertainment areas, a beach with an abundance of water sports and available-for-hire sailing boats, tennis courts, a shopping centre, and an enormous spa with a variety of menâs and womenâs massage, beauty and bathing therapies. In fact, guests will be amazed to discover that the list goes on. Mediterranean and Cretan a la carte dining is available in the olive grove Elies restaurant, while lunch is served at the Odysseus tavern, directly on the water''s edge, with a selection of fresh seafood and Greek dishes. The Kirki bar, offering delightful views across the bay, is the perfect place for aperitifs and cocktails, accompanied by piano music in the evening. In addition, drinks and snacks are served throughout the day at the Beach Bar. The bright, spacious, 37 square metre Deluxe rooms are beautifully decorated and furnished to ensure guests have a comfortable and simply unforgettable stay. They feature modern amenities, a pristine marble bathroom and a furnished private terrace. Connecting rooms are available on request.
